body:
Hi *!


For people who's interested, I've released
a bugfix version of radmap (0.1b).
There was a bug in the class that calculates solar
angles for EPW weather data input.


URL:
http://www.dream.unipa.it/dream/pub/dot/anselmo/radiance/05.php


The window$ binary version is not yet available,
but will be soon ...




Francesco Anselmo
pisuke@libero.it
anselmo@dream.unipa.it
___
